Title: QatarEnergy signs first North Field East LNG supply deal with Sinopec for 4 mtpa over 27 years
Description:
China’s state-owned Sinopec has agreed to buy 4 mtpa of LNG from QatarEnergy over 27 years from Qatar’s North Field East expansion LNG project for delivery to the Chinese firm’s LNG receiving terminals in China. 
The deal is the first long-term contract to be announced for supply from the North Field expansion project.
Author: CK

Title: Freeport LNG’s Asian LNG offtakers position vessels for mid-December restart
Description: LNG vessels chartered by the 15 mtpa Freeport LNG project’s Asian offtakers are the only ones currently signalling arrival at Freeport over the next month following a recent long-awaited update by the plant’s operator that its restart would be delayed until mid-December.
Author: CK
